text: Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?
Excuse me, do you have a map? I got lost in your eyes.
Are you a book? Because I can't stop staring at your cover.
I must be a snowflake, because I've fallen for you hard.
If you were a movie, I'd watch you over and over again.
Do you have a sunburn or are you always this hot?
